name: Keep the Dumb Rabbits Alive !
description:
Game for the Ludum Dare 46

Oh no ! The rabbits are reproducing way too fast ! If they keep going, the world is gonna end of overpopulation. It is your job to regulate them !

Rules :

A game lasts for 30 days, you need to have the highest score possible then. To do that, the populations of rabbits needs to stay in the green marker. After each day, some die of old age and other are born, you have to keep that in mind !

To finish the day, go back to the left exit.

Game by Datky and Warmiix, made on GameMkaer Studio 2
